TopicTitle: what ever happened to astronomers visual pack paradise

Articles.Content:
Just wondering but what ever happened to astronomers visual pack paradise i have been waiting a long time for it. can anyone clue me in on what happened?

thanks
Sounds like you're asking about a mod? Your question has been moved to the modding subforums.

AVP has been sort of dead for a while now, at least as far as the original author goes.  Some of the community took to repairing it for later builds but there have been rumors floating around that Astronomer has returned.  I'm not real sure, but there might be something coming soon-ish.  I don't know if I would expect it before 1.1 though.  A lot of mods are in a holding pattern on new features, there is just too much expected to changes when the game's engine is ripped out and replaced.  It's to be expected.

Edited January 10, 2016 by Alshain

He has returned, if you take a look at @Astronomer's user account. As soon as he returned all community revival attempts have been shut down last I heard. However he hasn't been active since end of november, which could be a bad sign

Edited January 12, 2016 by MegaUZI
